name: Stuck (Kkhav)
description:
Solve some puzzles, kill some bad guys and do it again!

CONTROLS:

* WASD for Movement

* E to Interact

* LMB to Use

___________________________________

HINT. 1 thing that seems not as obvious as I thought is when you switch gravity and a Cube is placed on a button at the beginning - it falls on ceiling and presses another button that switches gravity back to normal. 

Sorry in advance for bad English. Not my first langauge
